overview.en: The Hyperorchid Protocol (HOP) is a blockchain project developed anonymously by the top geek team. It is a decentralized point-to-point encrypted traffic consensus protocol that can provide highly secure access to terminal nodes for any traffic bandwidth-related business in the world.
overview.zh: Hyperorchid Protocol (HOP) 协议是由顶级极客团队匿名开发的一个区块链项目，它是一个去中心化点对点加密流量共识协议，可以为全世界任何与流量带宽相关的业务提供高度安全访问的终端节点。
